sentence in indonesian using the words: Ayo main bersama-sama di taman.
english translation: Let's play together at the park.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong beri aku satu potong kue.
english translation: Please give me a piece of cake.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya akan pasang lampu di ruang tamu.
english translation: I will install the light in the living room.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Lepas tali dan lepaskan burung itu.
english translation: Untie and release the bird.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya harus pikir lebih jauh sebelum memutuskan.
english translation: I need to think further before deciding.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Silakan simpan tas ini di lemari.
english translation: Please keep this bag in the wardrobe.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Anjing itu mulai kejar-kejaran dengan kucing.
english translation: The dog started chasing the cat.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong potong sayuran kecil-kecil.
english translation: Please cut the vegetables into small pieces.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Bolehkah saya ambil buku dari rak?
english translation: May I take the book from the shelf?

sentence in indonesian using the words: Lempar bola itu sejauh mungkin.
english translation: Throw the ball as far as possible.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong angkat koper itu ke lantai atas.
english translation: Please lift the suitcase to the upper floor.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kamu harus pilih satu warna favorit.
english translation: You have to choose one favorite color.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Anak-anak, tidurlah sekarang.
english translation: Children, go to sleep now.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Datanglah ke pesta ulang tahunku besok.
english translation: Come to my birthday party tomorrow.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Jagalah adikmu saat aku tidak ada di rumah.
english translation: Take care of your sibling when I'm not home.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong jawab pertanyaan guru dengan baik.
english translation: Please answer the teacher's question properly.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Duduklah di kursi yang kosong.
english translation: Please sit on the empty chair.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kumpulkan semua mainanmu ke dalam kotak.
english translation: Collect all your toys into the box.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Bukakan pintu ketika kamu pulang.
english translation: Open the door when you come back.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Silakan pikirkan dengan matang sebelum memutuskan.
english translation: Please think about it carefully before deciding.
